title: [Grawood Farmstead, Meadow]
description: Underfoot, shallow ruts in the path mark the trail as one frequently traveled by wagons, and the grass beyond the fence following the path is neat and short.  A trip of goats off to one side, meandering out in the meadow, are the most likely architects of the tidy landscaping.
room.location: Grawood Farmstead outside of River's Rest
